sentence.Network_en: He actually became convinced that the nurses had an unanswerable case.
sentence.Network_cn: 他实际上已经相信了护士们的情况确实如此。

sentence.Network_en: The stock market is convinced more cross-border deals will take place.
sentence.Network_cn: 股市相信跨境交易会越来越多。

sentence.Network_en: He was convinced that doctors and dentists knew best.
sentence.Network_cn: 他确信医生和牙医最清楚该怎么做。

entry.def: If you are convinced that something is true, you feel sure that it is true.

example.ex: He was convinced that I was part of the problem...
example.tran: 他确信我就是问题的一部分。

example.ex: He became convinced of the need for cheap editions of good quality writing...
example.tran: 他开始相信大众对优秀作品的普及本有需求。

means.word_mean: 1. having a strong belief or conviction;

sentences.sentence: "were convinced that it would be to their advantage to join"

auth_sentence.content: Except some of our viewers need to be convinced.

auth_sentence.content: I am not convinced of a true story here.

auth_sentence.content: Wyman Wheeler wasn't convinced everything was all right.

Sentence.sentence: I think your article in the school newspaper is right on target, and your viewpoints have certainly convinced me.

sentences.en: He was convinced of her innocence.
He was convinced that his theories were correct.
sentences.cn: 他确信他的学说是正确的。

sentences.en: But I am very much convinced,however,you’ll get him to come.
sentences.cn: 我相信你不管怎样都能把他请来。
